title: Ticket #1975: Have schedd use the same Email object as the shadow
description:
The schedd implements its own functionality for emailing the user when a job completes (aka schedd.cpp NotifyUser()). It should use the spiffy email object in the util lib (utils/email_cpp.cpp), just like the shadow does. This will eliminate unexpected differences in how user email notification works between different universes, and will allow us to maintain behavior of how/when email is sent in just one place.
